pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.2: Atha kho devadatto yena kokāliko kaṭamodakatissako khaṇḍadeviyā putto samuddadatto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā kokālikaṁ kaṭamodakatissakaṁ khaṇḍadeviyā puttaṁ samuddadattaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.3: “etha mayaṁ, āvuso, samaṇassa gotamassa saṅghabhedaṁ karissāma cakkabhedan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.6: Kathaṁ mayaṁ samaṇassa gotamassa saṅghabhedaṁ karissāma cakkabhedan”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.7: “Etha mayaṁ, āvuso, samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ upasaṅkamitvā pañca vatthūni yācissāma—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.8: ‘bhagavā, bhante, anekapariyāyena appicchassa santuṭṭhassa sallekhassa dhutassa pāsādikassa apacayassa vīriyārambhassa vaṇṇavādī.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.9: Imāni, bhante, pañca vatthūni anekapariyāyena appicchatāya santuṭṭhiyā sallekhāya dhutatāya pāsādikatāya apacayāya vīriyārambhāya saṁvattanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.12: yo gāmantaṁ osareyya, vajjaṁ naṁ phuseyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.14: yo nimantanaṁ sādiyeyya, vajjaṁ naṁ phuseyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.16: yo gahapaticīvaraṁ sādiyeyya, vajjaṁ naṁ phuseyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.18: yo channaṁ upagaccheyya, vajjaṁ naṁ phuseyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.20: yo macchamaṁsaṁ khādeyya, vajjaṁ naṁ phuseyyā’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.22: Te mayaṁ imehi pañcahi vatthūhi janaṁ saññāpessāmāti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.23: Sakkā kho, āvuso, imehi pañcahi vatthūhi samaṇassa gotamassa saṅghabhedo kātuṁ cakkabhedo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.1: Atha kho devadatto sapariso yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho devadatto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.5: Imāni, bhante, pañca vatthūni anekapariyāyena appicchatāya …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.7: Sādhu, bhante, bhikkhū yāvajīvaṁ āraññikā assu;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.8: yo gāmantaṁ osareyya vajjaṁ naṁ phuseyya …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.9: yāvajīvaṁ macchamaṁsaṁ na khādeyyuṁ, yo macchamaṁsaṁ khādeyya vajjaṁ naṁ phuseyyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.11: yo icchati āraññiko hotu, yo icchati gāmante viharatu;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.12: yo icchati piṇḍapātiko hotu, yo icchati nimantanaṁ sādiyatu;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.13: yo icchati paṁsukūliko hotu, yo icchati gahapaticīvaraṁ sādiyatu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.14: Aṭṭhamāse kho mayā, devadatta, rukkhamūlasenāsanaṁ anuññātaṁ, tikoṭiparisuddhaṁ macchamaṁsaṁ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.17: “na bhagavā imāni pañca vatthūni anujānātī”ti haṭṭho udaggo sapariso uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.18: Atha kho devadatto sapariso rājagahaṁ pavisitvā pañcahi vatthūhi janaṁ saññāpesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.19: “mayaṁ, āvuso, samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ upasaṅkamitvā pañca vatthūni yācimhā—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.20: ‘bhagavā, bhante, anekapariyāyena appicchassa santuṭṭhassa sallekhassa dhutassa pāsādikassa apacayassa vīriyārambhassa vaṇṇavādī.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.21: Imāni, bhante, pañca vatthūni anekapariyāyena appicchatāya santuṭṭhiyā sallekhāya dhutatāya pāsādikatāya apacayāya vīriyārambhāya saṁvattanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.22: Sādhu, bhante, bhikkhū yāvajīvaṁ āraññikā assu;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.23: yo gāmantaṁ osareyya, vajjaṁ naṁ phuseyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.25: yo nimantanaṁ sādiyeyya, vajjaṁ naṁ phuseyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.27: yo gahapaticīvaraṁ sādiyeyya, vajjaṁ naṁ phuseyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.29: yo channaṁ upagaccheyya, vajjaṁ naṁ phuseyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.31: yo macchamaṁsaṁ khādeyya, vajjaṁ naṁ phuseyyā’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.33: Te mayaṁ imehi pañcahi vatthūhi samādāya vattāmā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.1: Tattha ye te manussā assaddhā appasannā dubbuddhino te evamāhaṁsu—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.3: samaṇo pana gotamo bāhulliko bāhullāya cetetī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.4: Ye pana te manussā saddhā pasannā paṇḍitā byattā buddhimanto te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.5: “kathañhi nāma devadatto bhagavato saṅghabhedāya parakkamissati cakkabhedāyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.6: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.7: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.9: Atha kho te bhikkhū devadattaṁ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.10: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, devadatta, saṅghabhedāya parakkamasi cakkabhedāyā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.13: kathañhi nāma tvaṁ, moghapurisa, saṅghabhedāya parakkamissasi cakkabhedāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.15: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.16.1: “Yo pana bhikkhu samaggassa saṅghassa bhedāya parakkameyya, bhedanasaṁvattanikaṁ vā adhikaraṇaṁ samādāya paggayha tiṭṭheyya, so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.17: ‘māyasmā samaggassa saṅghassa bhedāya parakkami, bhedanasaṁvattanikaṁ vā adhikaraṇaṁ samādāya paggayha aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.18: Sametāyasmā saṅghena. Samaggo hi saṅgho sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeso phāsu viharatī’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.19: Evañca so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi vuccamāno tatheva paggaṇheyya, so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsitabbo tassa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.20: Yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsiyamāno taṁ paṭinissajjeyya, iccetaṁ kusalaṁ;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.8: “kathaṁ ime nānā assu, vinā assu, vaggā assū”ti pakkhaṁ pariyesati, gaṇaṁ bandhati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.20: aññehi bhikkhūhi. Ye passanti, ye suṇanti, tehi vattabbo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.21: “māyasmā samaggassa saṅghassa bhedāya parakkami, bhedanasaṁvattanikaṁ vā adhikaraṇaṁ samādāya paggayha aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.23: Samaggo hi saṅgho sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeso phāsu viharatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.30: “māyasmā samaggassa saṅghassa bhedāya parakkami, bhedanasaṁvattanikaṁ vā adhikaraṇaṁ samādāya paggayha aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.32: Samaggo hi saṅgho sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeso phāsu viharatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.41: Ayaṁ itthannāmo bhikkhu samaggassa saṅghassa bhedāya parakkamati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.43: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuṁ samanubhāseyya tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.46: Ayaṁ itthannāmo bhikkhu samaggassa saṅghassa bhedāya parakkamati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.48: Saṅgho itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuṁ samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.49: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.54: Ayaṁ itthannāmo bhikkhu samaggassa saṅghassa bhedāya parakkamati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.56: Saṅgho itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuṁ samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.57: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.59: Samanubhaṭṭho saṅghena itthannāmo bhikkhu tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.65: Saṅghādisesaṁ ajjhāpajjantassa ñattiyā dukkaṭaṁ, dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayā paṭippassambhanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:3.1.1: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññī na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:3.1.2: Dhammakamme vematiko na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:3.1.3: Dhammakamme adhammakammasaññī na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
